creator: garytse@eleceltek.com
text:
fo:page-sequence uses "master-reference" NOT "master-name"
(please refer to 
http://www.w3.org/TR/2001/REC-xsl-20011015/slice6.html#fo_page-sequence
for attribute of fo:page-sequence)

Error: 'master-name' for 'fo:page-sequence'matches no 'simple-page-master' 
or 'page-sequence-master'

Use FOP 0.20.3RC. It works as expected!

So this bug should be closed. If you're in trouble maybe is because incorrect
XSL so more info is needed
creator: vicentesalvador@netscape.net
gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
